quote: They were the men and the women of the sand, of the wind, of the light, of the night. They appeared as in a dream, at the crest of a dune, as if they were born of the cloudless sky.
quote_letters: THEY WERE THE MEN AND THE WOMEN OF THE SAND OF THE WIND OF THE LIGHT OF THE NIGHT THEY APPEARED AS IN A DREAM AT THE CREST OF A DUNE AS IF THEY WERE BORN OF THE CLOUDLESS SKY
